hero.heading: About Us
hero.tagline: Bringing the spirit of aloha to the desert

introduction.title: Welcome to 9th Island OCC
introduction.content: 9th Island Outrigger Canoe Club brings the spirit of aloha and Hawaiian outrigger canoe paddling tradition to Las Vegas. We are a community of paddlers dedicated to the sport of outrigger canoe racing and the cultural traditions that come with it.

mission.title: Our Mission
items: Promote the sport of outrigger canoe paddling
Build a strong ohana (family) of paddlers
Compete in regional and national races
Welcome paddlers of all skill levels

items.name: Racing
items.description: Compete in regional and national outrigger canoe races

items.name: Community Events
items.description: Beach cleanups, cultural celebrations, and social gatherings

items.name: Beginner Programs
items.description: Introduction to outrigger paddling for new members

staff.name: Head Coach
staff.title: Coming Soon
staff.bio: Contact us to learn more about our experienced coaching team.

staff.name: Assistant Coach
staff.title: Coming Soon
staff.bio: Our coaches bring years of paddling experience and aloha spirit.

joinUs.title: Join Us
joinUs.content: Whether you're an experienced paddler or completely new to the sport, we welcome you to our ohana. Contact us to learn more about joining 9th Island OCC.
